snippet: The virulence of Type 2 diabetes in children is yet another reason to fight childhood obesity.
abstract: Editorial cites a study of overweight and obese children published in The New England Journal of Medicine that has found that Type 2 diabetes progresses faster and is harder to treat in young people than in adults; criticizes Congressional Republicans for attempting to dismantle health care reforms that could greatly assist in curbing the obesity epidemic.
lead_paragraph: The virulence of Type 2 diabetes in children is yet another reason to fight childhood obesity.
